about_the_game:
Play the lewd version of Burrow of the Fallen Bear unlocking all content 18+.

Content


  • More than 25 lewd CGs
  • 7 Unique Hot Scenes
  • An NSFW Gallery in your game
  • Unique lewd lines to your story
  • Exclusive achievements

content_descriptors.notes: Burrow of the Fallen Bear contains strong language, partial and full nudity, and explicit male homosexual sex (oral and anal).
